xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Class ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.VersionClass_precedingVersionReference=Preceding version reference BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_draft=Brouillon ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_review= BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_complete=Terminé
# Library Reference Class ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference= BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference.Empty=--- ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference_= ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference=Library Version Reference BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference.Empty=--- ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference_=
# Publication Configuration Class BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source=Page source* ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source_hint=The top page of the tree to be published, usually the top page of the book/library. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace=Page de destination* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace_hint=L'espace dans lequel le contenu sera publié (obligatoire) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version=Version* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version_hint=La version à publier (obligatoire) ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant=Variant ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant_hint=The variant to publish. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language=Langue BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language_hint=La langue à publier BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete=Ne publier que les pages "Terminées" ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete_hint=Publish only the pages with the status "Complete". If unchecked, all statuses are published. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder=Ordre de publication des pages ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder_hint=Publish the page order from the source, which might overwrite the target ordering. If unchecked, the target ordering is left untouched. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour=Comportement de la publication ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_hint=Which behaviour to adopt when the target space is already populated. "Cancel" for not publishing ; "Update" to publish update existing pages, add new pages from source but leave page deleted from source in the destination. Pages marked as deleted in source will be removed from destination. ; "Re-publish" to reset the destination space. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_cancel=Annuler BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_update=Mettre à jour BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_republish=Re-publier BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description=Description BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description_hint=Description de la configuration
# Sheet BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.versionConfiguration=Configuration de la version ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.librariesConfiguration=Libraries Configuration BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.newConfiguration=Nouvelle configuration BookVersions.Code.VariantClassSheet.associatedPages=Pages associées ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.VariantClassSheet.variantConfiguration=Variant Configuration BookVersions.Code.DeletedContentClassSheet.titlePrefix=SUPPRIMÉ : ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.DeletedContentClassSheet.warning= BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.nextButton=Publier

# Page Creation form ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.newPage=New page ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle=Page title ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle.hint=The title of the page. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned=Unversioned content ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned.hint=When the page is unversioned, the option of creating different content for multiple versions will be disabled and the same content of the page will be displayed in all versions of the book. It will be possible, though, to switch back to versioned content. ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.create=Create ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.add=Add ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.name=Name ### Missing: BookVersions.creationForm.libTitle=Library title

BookVersions.navMenu.unversionedTitle=non versionné BookVersions.navMenu.createVersionWithLink=Créer du contenu pour la version {0} ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.warning.noversion=The page is versioned, but it doesn''t have content for version {0} or its preceding versions. ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect=Variant ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.contentForVariant= ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.pageIsNotAssociated=Page not linked to variant {0}. ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.pageAvailableForAll=Page is not restricted to a variant. ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.pageRestrictedTo= ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.associateVariantWithLink=Link page to variant {0} BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect=Langue ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.currentLanguage= ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.noLanguageSelected=No language was selected.
# Administration menu ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.title=Versions ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.manage=Manage ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVersions=Versions ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVariants=Variants ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.manageLibraries=Libraries BookVersions.adminMenu.manageLanguages=Langues ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.pageActions=Page Actions ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.addPageToVariant=Link page to variant {0} ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.removePageFromVariant=Unlink page from variant {0} ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.publishLable=Publishing ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.convertToUnversioned=Convert to unversioned ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.convertToVersioned=Convert to versioned BookVersions.adminMenu.statusLable=Statut BookVersions.adminMenu.publish=Publication BookVersions.navMenu.markDeleted=Marquer comme supprimé BookVersions.navMenu.unmarkDeleted=Ne plus marquer comme supprimé BookVersions.navMenu.deleteVersion=Supprimer cette version BookVersions.navMenu.deleteAllVersions=Supprimer toutes les versions BookVersions.navMenu.deletePage=Supprimer cette page ### Missing: BookVersions.navMenu.noLanguageSelected=No language was selected. BookVersions.navMenu.defaultLanguage=Langue par défaut BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.not_translated=A traduire BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.outdated=Traduction périmée BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.translated=Traduit ### Missing: BookVersions.adminMenu.librariesText=The following libraries are configured to be used in the current book. To edit the configuration, go to the Versions administration page of the book and edit the version pages.
# PageSheet content BookVersion.pageSheet.nocontent=Il n'y a aucun contenu pour cette version

You have the option to either create the content for this version, or to switch to version {1}. ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupSwitchVersion=Switch to version {0} ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupCreateContentForVersion=Create content for version {0} BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupCancel=Annuler
